Prerequisite(s): Two Tempest Gale maneuvers
Range: Ranged attack
Target: One creature
Duration: Instantaneous (see text)

Description

Your slings and arrows can bring down even the mightiest fliers, dropping them to the earth where their wings mean nothing. Make a ranged attack. If it hits, it deals weapon damage as normal plus an additional [[5d6]] points of damage, and if the target of the attack is flying, they must succeed at a Fly check opposed by your Sleight of Hand check or lose their ability to fly for a number of rounds equal to your initiation modifier, falling to the ground and taking falling damage as normal.
